thread.title: Rochester experiences the warmest December on record | News | kimt.com
thread.title_full: Rochester experiences the warmest December on record | News | kimt.com

author: Aaron White
title: Rochester experiences the warmest December on record | News | kimt.com
text: Rochester, MN (KIMT) -- It's official! December 2023 will go down as the warmest December on record for Rochester. Throughout the month, temperatures trended to be near or above normal. Only one day recorded a high temperature more than 2 degrees below normal. The calendar below shows that a majority of days features high temperatures that were above normal. Overall, the month ended with an average temperature of 31.8°, which is 1.1° higher than the 1931 record of 30.7°. It was also 11.0° warmer than the 30-year average (1991-2020) of 20.8°. According to the National Weather Service in La Crosse, several other daily records were also set during the month of December. - December 16 - Warm Low of 35°F - Tied with 1977 - December 23 - Warm Low of 39°F - Previous Record 33°F in 1982 and 2005 - December 24 - Record High of 52°F - Previous Record 28°F in 2021 - December 24 - Warm Low of 44°F - Previous Record 36°F in 1936 - December 24 - Highest Dew Point of 52°F - Previous record was 41°F in 2021 - December 25 - Record High of 53°F - Previous Record 50°F in 1936 - December 25 - Warm Low of 44°F - Previous Record 38°F in 1936 - December 25 - Highest Dew Point of 52°F - Previous record was 37°F in 2016
